text: Karor railway station or Karor Lal Esan railway station (, ) is located in Karor Lal Esan, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Layyah District Category:Railway stations on Kotri–Attock Railway Line (ML 2)
title: Karor railway station
